messages.message: Now that everything is set up for reaching elasticsearch, it wouldn't be that hard to add a quick list view of audit logs in the metrics app. Would that be useful @Matt?
It would be pretty bare bones, but I think I can get out an MVP with about a day of work. I'll investigate more and let you know
@Jessica, lmk if you need help with the backend portion of that. We were thinking about making a public api for this, would be great to unite that with what the metrics app would need

That would be great! For now maybe we could put something in `elastic_query_builder.py` that would function very similarly to the other ones - we should only need one or two additional functions there
I'll let you know when I have scoped out more what I need from elasticsearch
